heading.title: A few favorite projects I've worked on

jobs.title: Senior Developer
jobs.description: At Mediacurrent I get the opportunity to support and lead on a variety of projects with different technology stacks such as React, Gatsby, Drupal, etc. With my experience, I also get a great opportunity to mentor my team to help them grow professionally and with their technical skills.

jobs.title: Supervisor, Web Services
jobs.description: At VCS I led the Web Services team. Our district website had 128 subsites and about 70 school sites! My favorite project here was planning and leading the district website redesign for vscedu.org.

jobs.title: Manager, Web Content
jobs.description: At Furniture Leisure I was a content manager and strategist for 5 eCommerce websites. Oversaw the relaunch of 2 eCommerce websites to an upgraded system, new design, and revamped content for SEO.

jobs.title: Bachelor's in Science - Information Technology
jobs.description: Bachelor's in Science where I learned the core concepts of web development.

heading_skills.title: On a typical day I work with

contact.description: Senior Developer with 8 years experience in managing the development of projects from concept to implementation.

thought_items.title: When Drupal Met Gatsby, an Early Adopters Case Study
